thread.section_title: PRTG Network Monitor Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von PRTG Network Monitor | paessler.com
thread.title: Mike Kelly
thread.title_full: PRTG Network Monitor bewertet von Mike Kelly

author: Mike Kelly
title: Mike Kelly
text:
It is very flexible in that you can monitor with sensors, probes and mix in scripts to sensors.
We have been able to cover the gamut from pings to a device to windows OS states to hardware states (IE: CPU/disk/RAM usage to name a few)
Had this setup within days of install and it was generating alerts of state we were un-aware of.
